title: 14-year-old Hawaiian cast as 'Moana' for Disney
text:
> Entertainment 14-year-old Hawaiian cast as 'Moana' for Disney This undated image released by Disney shows Auli’i Cravalho, 14, who will voice the title character in the animated film, "Moana." The film opens in U.S. theaters on Nov. 23, 2016. (Hugh E. Gentry/Disney via AP) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
